import * as react from 'react'; import { Checkbox, FormControlLabel, FormGroup, Grid, Stack, Card, CardHeader, CardContent, Container, Paper, Divider, Typography, Button, } from '@mui/material'; const PPET: string[] = [ 'Helmet', 'Mask', 'Reflective Vest', 'Safety Gloves', 'Goggles', 'Safety Boots', ]; export default function AlertSettings(): React.ReactElement { return ( PPE Type {PPET.map((item) => ( } /> ))} Notifications Type {['EMAIL', 'SMS'].map((item) => ( } /> ))} NOTE:1. 勾选需要的 PPE 类型。
2. 设置通知方式。
3. 点击保存以应用更改。 ); }
